---
title: 5x Sit-to-Stand Test (5xSST)
---

# Overview

- <5 minute test
- Assesses
    - Functional Mobility
    - Strength

# Setup & Equipment

- Chair with backrest (43-45 cm, 17-18 inches)
- Stopwatch

# Administration

- 1 trial only
- Patient
    - Seated with back against the chair
    - Arms folded across their chest^[Patients with hemiplegia can have the impaired arm at their side or in a sling]
